item.title: Dynamic advertisement
item.description: Best practices for dynamic advertisement ​​ Verify user roles & obtain prefix IDs To prevent issues and simplify the advertisement process during an attack scenario, complete the following tasks. Assign appropriate user roles. Ensure that users assigned to manage the status of IP prefix advertisement have the Administrator or Super Administrator role in your Cloudflare account. For more information, refer to Setting up Multi-user accounts on Cloudflare External link icon Open external link .

item.title: IRR entries
item.description: Best practices for IRR entry updatesTo add or update an IRR entry, use one of the routing registries listed in the Internet Routing Registry External link icon Open external link . Suggested registries are AFRINIC, APNIC, ARIN, NTT, RADB, and RIPE. ​​ Updating IRR entries If you own your own subnet, use the RIPE and APNIC routing registries. These registries allow you to verify subnet ownership. If you lease your subnet, follow these guidelines: When you do not need ownership verification, use the AFRINIC or NTT routing registry.
